vulnerabilities.title: Regular Expression Denial of Service in cross-spawn
vulnerabilities.description: Versions of cross-spawn before 7.0.5 are vulnerable to Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS)

vulnerabilities.title: Arbitrary code execution in @babel/traverse
vulnerabilities.description: Babel vulnerable to arbitrary code execution when compiling specifically crafted malicious code

vulnerabilities.title: Uncontrolled resource consumption in braces
vulnerabilities.description: The NPM package braces fails to limit the number of characters it can handle

vulnerabilities.title: Exposure of sensitive information in follow-redirects
vulnerabilities.description: follow-redirects exposes sensitive information to an unauthorized actor

vulnerabilities.title: Open redirect vulnerability in Express.js
vulnerabilities.description: Express.js minimalist web framework for node. In express < 4.19.2, passing untrusted user input to response.redirect() may allow attackers to redirect users to malicious websites
